string.text: Well, if you see anyone like that, let me know.
Hello there. You must be one of those lordly types who ride their horses about this land, scrabbling for wealth and power. I wonder what you hope to gain from such things...
{LEADER.LINK} has arrived at {ARMY_NAME}.
You have failed to find the spy. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is disappointed.
I would like to enter {FACTION_SERVICE_TERM}.
Thank you. I'm sure your guys are worth their salt..
Have a good day.
Well... I don't know what to say. Goodbye, then.
Don't worry I'll bring her.
Sure. We will wait other parties around {GATHERING_SETTLEMENT} for a while, then follow us.
You didn't feel like splitting the loot, so you betrayed both the merchant and the gang leader.
Is this a joke? You've some nerve asking me for favours, {PLAYER.NAME}, and let me assure you you'll get none.[if:convo_stern]

Yes {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} would probably be sad. But not because of what you think. See, {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} promised me to one of {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} allies' sons and this will devastate {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} plans. That is true.
I speak to many people. Of course, as I am loyal to {QUEST_GIVER.NAME}, I am always on the lookout for spies. But I've seen no one like this.
We hear a lot of complaints about you lately. You better start behaving or you'll get yourself a good flogging.[if:convo_mocking_revenge]
Thank you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. We will be moving immediately.
Thank you. I cannot guarantee I'd do the same for you, but I thank you.
You don't seem trustworthy. I have no interest in your offer.
You should leave now.
Stop! We don't need to fight any longer. We have no quarrel with you as justice has been served.
I have no choice, do I? Well, better an honest robber than a traitor! Let's take {?PLAYER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} down.
Not yet, but I will soon.
Look, my good {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?}, these are hard times for sure, but I need you to move along. You'll scare away my customers.
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. I own land around here. I speak for many of the people in this village.
All AI pawns blocked. Removing one of the player's pawns to make a move

Well - we like tournaments to be memorable. So the sponsors pitch together and buy a prize that they'll be talking about in the markets for weeks. A jeweled blade, say, or a fine-bred warhorse. Something a champion would be proud to own.
I rather enjoy wealth and power.
Ah... Well, I am afraid that is not enough.
The townsfolk told you that the spy has no distinctive scars or other facial markings.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, a merchant from {SETTLEMENT_NAME}, told you that {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} daughter {TARGET_HERO.NAME} has either been abducted or run off with a local rogue. You have agreed to search for her and bring her back to {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. If you cannot find their tracks when you exit settlement, you should visit the nearby villages of {SETTLEMENT_NAME} to look for clues and tracks of the kidnapper.
Many people tell themselves that they only want power to do good, but still seek it for its own sake. The only way to know for sure that you do not lust after power is to give it up.
Just passing through. What goes on here?
{SALUTATION_BY_PLAYER}, I wish to be more than a mercenary. Is there a way I could pledge myself as a vassal?
Any other questions?
I am glad that I found you. Please rejoin my party.
Now then... If you're asking,[ib:normal]
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}, a merchant. I trade out of {SETTLEMENT_STRING}. {BUSINESS_STRING}
You're not getting along with the rest of the company. It's better you go.
I just have a minute here, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. I need to get back to the loom. How can I help you?
I really hope your men can get my deed back. On my father's name, I will never gamble again.
Meh... Do you think ruling the streets of a city is easy? You underestimate us. Now, about the money.
{SALUTATION_BY_PLAYER}, I wish to be released from my oath to you.
You have lost the battle against the merchant's caravan and failed to help {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
Release from homage? Hmm, perhaps it would be for the best... However, {PLAYER.NAME}, you must be sure that release is what you desire. This is not a thing done lightly.

{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} shared their plan for robbing {TARGET_MERCHANT.LINK} with you. You agreed to send your companion along with {TROOP_COUNT} men to lead the ambush for them. They will return after {RETURN_DAYS} days.
Your clan member {MOTHER} has just learned that she is with child.
Come to have your hair cut, {?PLAYER.GENDER}my lady{?}my lord{\?}? A new look for a new day?

You are known as a brave {?PLAYER.GENDER}warrior{?}warrior{\?} and a fine leader of men, {PLAYER.NAME}. I shall be pleased to accept your sword into my service, if you are ready to swear homage to me.
You want to marry a corpse? Because I'm going to kill your lover if you don't listen.
Currently, {PRISONER_NAMES} {?IS_PLURAL}are{?}is{\?} imprisoned here.
I don't take orders from the likes of you.
I would like to assign you a new role.
I have but I need to deal with some other problems before leading the caravan.
I am not convinced. I will protect the accused until you see reason.

Of course. I have employed spies myself. But if a tournament participant is asking questions about the state of the garrison and the walls, things which would concern no honest traveler - well, between that and the private information I've received, I think we'd have our man. The spy must be hiding inside {SELECTED_SETTLEMENT}. Once you are there start questioning the townsfolk.
{COMPANION.NAME} is now a {?COMPANION.GENDER}noblewoman{?}lord{\?} of the {KINGDOM}.
Mm. I suppose. Takes my mind off all these problems I have to deal with.
You should now have enough evidence to identify the spy. You might be able to find the tournament participants hanging out in the alleys with local thugs. Find and speak with them.
That sounds expensive.
a servant of the {FACTION_NAME}
Is there any other way to solve this other than asking around?
..and I will be at your side to fight your enemies should you need my sword.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has lost the ownership of {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}. Your contract with {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} has canceled.
That will do. You've made a wise choice, my friend. We do well by our loyal fighters, and you can expect worthy rewards for your service.

You ask around the village if anyone saw {TARGET_HERO.NAME} or some suspicious characters with a young woman.\n\nVillagers say that they saw a young man and woman ride in early in the morning. They bought some supplies and trotted off towards {TARGET_VILLAGE}.
I can escort you for 10 days. After that, I must return to my own affairs.
{SETTLEMENT} is yours.
Nimr Nimr he was killed. Died in the cage of the Banu Qild.{newline}All the ladies cry their grief. All the husbands sigh in relief.
I know of one starting up at {CLOSEST_TOURNAMENT}. You should be able to get there if you move quickly enough.
Hmf. Really?[ib:closed][if:idle_angry]
Rest easy. Your captivity has ended.
I'd prefer to keep the difficulty where it's at.
You are a sharp thinker. Our kingdom would do well to hear your thoughts on matters of importance.
Certainly. A good game always keeps the mind active and fresh.
Tell me more. What's wrong with the man?
Can I fly my own banner?
Scout {CURRENTLY_HELD_SCOUT}
I can't spare anyone now. You will need to go alone.
You will lose the ownership of the alley.
Your settlement {SETTLEMENT} is besieged by {PARTY} of {FACTION}!
I'm {PLAYER.NAME}. Let's skip the pleasantries and get right to business.
Would you care to pass the time with a game of {GAME_NAME}?
If you need me, you know where to find me.
So be it. Let's go. {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}
What my man did was wrong, there's no denying. But they hanged him, and now what am I to do? Do his children bear his guilt?
I believe it hasn't been long since we've last bartered.
So... In our lands, it's customary to pay us a tax for our protection. Unless you want a fight.
I hope you won't be regret with your decision, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.
It's quiet. Too quiet. Things never stay quiet around here for long.
You're right. I cannot do this. I will return to my family.
Hmm.. Very well. Sorry for interrupting.

You shall be numbered among the sons of Asera. Your blood is our blood. Our swords shall defend your rights as you defend ours. You may drink from our wells and rest in the shade of our trees. You may be granted the authority to judge disputes and collect revenues from oases and towns.
One way or the other, you'll regret this. If I fall, my people will have their revenge.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
{HERO.LINK} gained a level.
How do I know he's not forcing you to say that?
Very well, my lady. I hope we shall meet again soon.
Damn the summer. Can't sleep at night for the heat. And now they say the well's running low...
How will you help? Will you protect me?
It was a thin harvest. It will be a lean winter and a cruel spring. You mark my words.[rf:convo_grave]
I knew you are a reasonable {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?}.
I'm still not sure about all this, but I trust you. Let's go get this over.
Select {COMPANION.NAME}{.o} clan name:
I am thinking of a different person.
You will regret pushing your nose into issues that do not concern you!
All right. I am waiting for your runner.
I am sorry, my friend, but I need your help in this.
Is there a way to form a caravan includes better troops?
Yes I will. Come now, I will take you with me to {TARGET_NOTABLE.NAME} to resolve this issue peacefully.
I need to leave. Good-bye, for now.
Sorry about the smell around here, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. Tanning's like that, sorry to say. How can I help you?
Alley fight won
Go back
I have a mission for you...
So, I heard from my {RANDOM_RELATIVE} that he took some {._}{PLURAL(ITEM_NAME)} over to {TOWN_NAME}, and made a profit of {PRICE_DIFF}{GOLD_ICON}.
All right. I am in.
Okay. I think I get it.
Unfortunately, I only allow betting when I'm playing at my best. You'll have to up the difficulty.
{COMPANION.NAME} left your clan.
I could go myself, or send a companion.
Good. Then repeat the words of the oath with me: {OATH_LINE_1}
Yes, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}sir{\?}.

I have a problem. My young kinsman {PRODIGAL_SON.LINK} has gone to town to have fun, drinking, wenching and gambling. Many young men do that, but it seems he was a bit reckless. Now he sends news that he owes a large sum of money to {TARGET_HERO.LINK}, one of the local gang bosses in the city of {SETTLEMENT_LINK}. These ruffians are holding him as a “guest” in their house until someone pays his debt.
No... No. It does not make sense.
What role do you have in mind?
I'll meet you outside then, captain.
Farewell for now. Walk the path of the righteous, and the Heavens will protect you.
What are you offering?
Your alley in {SETTLEMENT} is under attack from neighboring gangs. Unless you go to their help, the alley will be lost in {RESPONSE_TIME} days.
How many men do you need for it? For each men I want 100{GOLD_ICON}.
I'm very sorry to hear that. You'll find no better employers than the {FACTION_NAME}, be sure of that.

Sometimes I feel like running off to join those hermits over on Mount Erithrys and putting my worries behind me. Even better, maybe some of these great lords would go there. They can retire and live out their days in the sun, not worrying about being beheaded or betrayed, and they wouldn't need to tax us any. Be better for everyone.

This save file is from a game version that is older than e1.7.0. Please switch your game version to e1.7.0, load the save file and save the game. This will allow it to work on newer versions beyond e1.7.0.
I would be honored.
What? I don't understand.
Welcome to our ranks then. Let's kill those bastards!
It is nice to have you with us.
Thank you kind {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sir{\?}, thank you.
After questioning some folk in town, you learned that the spy has a beard.
Now that's an unpleasant set of options. How about we just not fight today?[ib:closed]
{ISSUE_OWNER.NAME} asks the player to aid a young clan member. He is supposed to have huge gambling debts so the gang leaders holds him as a hostage. You are asked to retrieve him any way possible.
Your clan is at war with factions that {KINGDOM} is not hostile with.
You are free to go wherever you want, {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.
Mu Torere
What do you produce here?
I understand. If that is the case, I will let you go.
I am thinking of a different kind of workshop.
Emp'ror Arenicos feeling fine. Went to bed with a cup of wine.{newline}In the morning he was dead. Now his wife rules in his stead!

Only my loyal vassals can own lands and castles in my realm -- and all my vassals are men.I am not inclined to depart from this tradition without a very good reason. If you prove yourself in battle, you can swear an oath of homage to me and become my vassal.We may then discuss how you may obtain a castle.
There's bandits lurking just beyond the outermost fields, I hear. What about the taxes we pay, I ask you? Why aren't {?OWNER.GENDER}Lady{?}Lord{\?} {OWNER.LINK}'s men doing their jobs?
I can't afford that just now.
Are you sure? If you are, we can pack up and join you.
I would like you to serve {FACTION_NAME} as mercenary.
The {CLAN_NAME} ended its mercenary contract and became a vassal of the {NEW_FACTION_NAME}
I can't just hang on here forever. Be quick about it.
I repeat: Yield or fight!
Very well. Death before dishonor![if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
Can't talk right now. Got to keep my eye on things around here.
I shall heed your judgements and pay you the tribute that is your due, so that this land may have a strong protector.
Well now... A small donation to our cause in silver would earn you passage.
I have acolytes who seek me out from time to time. I can have one of them take a message to your kinfolk. Perhaps you would like to name an heir?

Let it be known that from this day forward, you are my sworn {?PLAYER.GENDER}follower{?}man{\?} and vassal. I give you my protection and grant you the right to bear arms in my name, and I pledge that I shall not deprive you of your life, liberty or properties except by the lawful judgment of your peers or by the law and custom of the land.

{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}, a merchant from {ISSUE_GIVER_SETTLEMENT}, has told you that {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} daughter has gone missing. You choose {COMPANION.LINK} and {REQUIRED_TROOP_AMOUNT} men to search for her and bring her back. You expect them to complete this task and return in {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_DAYS} days.
Okay. I hope you will not regret this.
Yes, we will.
Yes? What do you want?
I see. Maybe we will speak again when I have one.
Surgeon {CURRENTLY_HELD_SURGEON}
So we fight.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]

You tried to defend {CULPRIT.LINK} but you were overcome. {NOTABLE.LINK} took {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} revenge. You failed to protect {CULPRIT.LINK} as promised to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} is furious.
Hmf. I am amused. So amused that I might have to cut out your tongue after the battle and keep it to remind me of your wit.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
I want to claim {SETTLEMENT}.
I'm not interested, thank you.
I will endeavor to treat you as well as I can.
{STR1} {STR2}
What there is to talk about? This bastard murdered one of my kinsman, and it is our right to take vengeance on him!
Always a please, m'lady. Keep safe.
Let's see what you will come up with...
So, then. What is it?
I am ready, {LORD.LINK}.
What do you want me to do?
Greetings my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, how may I help you?
It's great doing business with you. I'll order my men to release him immediately.
Ah, yes! We had such rhymes when I was young.
Prodigal son of {CLAN}
So you pay us to fight? What's in it for you?

One of my relatives fell victim to his temper during a quarrel and killed a man from {TARGET_VILLAGE}. We have offered to pay blood money but the family of the deceased have stubbornly refused it. As it turns out, the deceased is kin to {TARGET_NOTABLE}, an elder of this region and now the men of {TARGET_VILLAGE} have sworn to kill my relative.
So be it. Come see me again if you want to arrange a new one.
Wouldn't want to be the poor lovesick sap who ran off with {QUEST_GIVER.NAME}'s daughter.
Very well. I'm going to need about {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} to settle up some debts, though. Can you pay?
I'll start.

Now some people say our {?OWNER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} {OWNER.LINK} is as mean as a scalded cat. But I say most people are villains, and it's good they feel a little fear. Anyway, there's meat on the table these days, and who can argue with that?
Your spouse {MOTHER} has just learned that she is with child.
Well... Thank you very much. I am grateful.
Maybe {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} will help you to remember me.
{WEAPON} of {SETTLEMENT} hit some soldiers of {BESIEGER}!
As of now, I do not have 1000 denars to afford on gambling. I may get back to you once I get the required amount.
Excuse me, {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}my lady{?}sir{\?}. But I feel I need to think about this.
Ploughing, sowing... Got many weeks of that ahead of us still.
Troops have been joined to your party
Let me just go over what we'd do there. {WORKSHOP_DESCRIPTION} Are you sure you want to change this workshop to {.%}{.a} {WORKSHOP_TYPE}{.%}?
I'll be looking you up again soon, m'lady, with your permission,
I shall inform any lord I meet that you are gathering the army, then.
What else can I do?
my wife
Not to me sir, no. I did overhear someone talking to another merchant about such things. I remember him because he had this nasty looking sword by his side.
I was just passing by.
Help {ISSUE_GIVER.NAME} to rob {TARGET_MERCHANT.NAME} by acting as their guard.
Your word shall direct the strike of my sword and the flight of my arrow...

One other small thing... I've had to take some money from some fairly dangerous people around here. I'll need {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} to get that beast off my back. Do you reckon you can pay me that?

So... The word is that {NOTABLE.LINK} is looking to cut costs at {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} {.%}{SHOP_TYPE}{.%}. They say {?NOTABLE.GENDER}she{?}he{\?}'s been docking the men's wages right and left.

Now, I was talking to my {RANDOM_RELATIVE}, and he tells me he bought some {._}{PLURAL(ITEM_NAME)} around here for cheap and took it to {TOWN_NAME}. Said he made {PRICE_DIFF}{GOLD_ICON} of profit on each one.

You have cleared an alley which belonged to a gang leader. Now, you can either take it over for your own benefit or leave it empty to help the town. To own an alley, you will need to assign a suitable clan member and some troops to watch over it. This will provide denars to your clan, but also increase your crime rating.
My thanks. It feels good to be {?PLAYER.GENDER}free{?}a free man{\?} once again.
I was just jesting. I need you more than ever. Now go back to your job.
If you have work for me, we could discuss it.
The {WEAPON} of {BESIEGER} hit wall of {SETTLEMENT}!
Forgive me {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. I don't know what I was thinking.
Very well. Follow us.
Good day to you.
All right. It's good to be back.
I'm no child, {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sir{\?}! Draw your weapon! I challenge you to a duel!

{?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Lady{?}Lord{\?} {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} from {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}, has told you about rumors of a spy disguised amongst the tournament attendees. You agreed to take care of the situation by yourself. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} believes that the spy is posing as an tournament attendee in the city of {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}.
It was a pleasure, sir. I hope to see you again some time soon.
I will find the one you are looking for.
I have already decided. Don't expect me to change my mind.
The {?NOTABLE.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} {NOTABLE.LINK}... We're blessed.
We do not need hired swords to win this war. You should seek your fortune elsewhere.
Hmm... Maybe, but I can't remember who. I didn't think it suspicious.
Sure, boss. It will cost us {COST}{GOLD_ICON}. Want to go ahead?
There are some townspeople who've looked after me here, made sure I was fed and that. I'd like to give them something before I go. Could I ask for {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} as an advance?

Only loyal vassals of {FACTION_LEADER} can own lands and castles. You understand, a simple mercenary cannot be trusted with such responsibility. However, after serving for some time, you may earn the right to swear homage to {FACTION_LEADER} and become his vassal. Then you would be rewarded with a fief.
Great. Going to need some money in advance though - {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}. Can you pay?
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has prepared {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} men and is waiting for you.
I must leave now.
I heard in the market that {NOTABLE.LINK} is hiring at {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} {.%}{SHOP_TYPE}{.%}. Treats {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} workers well, they say.
Only a faction leader can grant vassalhood. Your relationship with that leader must be at least {RELATION} and you need a Clan Tier of {TIER}.
Here {?HERO.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} is.
Practice fight
It would be in your interest to let this young nobleman go...

{GAME_NAME} is a traditional game within the {CULTURE_NAME}. It is a game of calm strategy. You start by placing your pieces on the board, crafting a trap for your enemy to fall into. Then you battle across the board, capturing and eliminating your oponent.
Do you have any general thoughts on politics?
{RESPONSE_TIME} {?RESPONSE_TIME>1}days{?}day{\?} left.
Yes, how easy should I make things for you?

I'll tell anyone who asks: {NOTABLE.LINK} is a righteous {?NOTABLE.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?}, and the Heavens speak through {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} mouth. The lords of this land must listen to {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}him{\?}, or misfortune will fall upon us.
You need to be the owner of this settlement!
I will have one of my companions and {REQUIRED_TROOP_AMOUNT} of my men protect your kinsman for {RETURN_DAYS} days.
Can you take me to {?HERO.GENDER}her{?}him{\?}?
The {CLAN_NAME} and the {KINGDOM_NAME} have ended their mercenary contract.
I cannot afford this.
Listen to me. I'm on assignment from {QUEST_GIVER.NAME}. Have any strangers been around here, asking odd questions about the garrison?
Of course, {PLAYER.NAME}. Farewell.
We will see.
I'm not sure about using my authority in this way. Is there any other way to solve this?
Your horse is turned into a {MODIFIED_NAME}, since it got seriously injured.
Thank you my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.
My {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, please give me more time to think about this.
Great, let's begin!
Sure. What do you want to know?
{HERO.NAME} joined your party.
Do not waste time, {PLAYER.NAME}. The spy probably won't linger any longer than he has to. Or she has to.
Your skills are not what I need.
Yes. Let's have another round.
I'm busy, but I will leave a companion and some men.
I got my gold, you got your boy. Now leave me alone...
You'd better hurry up!
You are passing through our lands without our permission.
This workshop belongs to {OWNER.NAME}, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.
Whom do you want to lead the caravan?
Yes, you will see. Good day to you.
Heavens protect us from the {?NOTABLE.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} {NOTABLE.LINK}...
Thinking again, I already have more companions than I can manage.
What's happening? Am I free?
My man and I, we never wed proper. So he made a bit of money in the wars and wanted to marry a rich man's daughter. 'Cast her out,' she told him, and that's what he did.
Worry not. The outlaws in these parts know my name well, and fear it.
I could use some more troops in my party. Have you found any volunteers?
Welcome to {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. I think you'll find these are good, law-abiding folk, for the most part.
Tell me how tournaments work.
I own {.%}{BUSINESS_LIST}{.%} here.
Sure, but first you will need to pay me and my men {GOLD_AMOUNT} denars for our efforts.
{CLAN_MEMBER.NAME} is in charge of the alley. {?CLAN_MEMBER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} is currently traveling to the alley and will arrive after {HOURS} {?HOURS > 1}hours{?}hour{\?}.
I know spies are hard to catch but I tasked this to you for a reason. Do not let me down {PLAYER.NAME}.
You failed to bring the daughter back to her {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}mother{?}father{\?} as promised to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is furious
What would it take for you to let me go my way?
Now, I suggest you prepare for a serious campaign. Train and equip your soldiers as best you can in the meantime, and respond quickly when you are summoned for duty.
Meet {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} now
I will free your kinsman myself.
As you wish.
Marvellous! You cut a splendid appearance, {?PLAYER.GENDER}my lady{?}my lord{\?}, if you don't mind my saying. Most splendid.
Garios Garios brave and strong... Always right and never wrong...{newline}The men all trust him with their lives.. But not their daughters or their wives.
Yes. I have {TROOPS_TO_RECRUIT} ready to join you.
Hmm... You may be right. It's not worth it. I'll release the boy immediately.
Yes, I am sure.
your lordship
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. I am a humble follower of the fellowship known as the {FACTION_NAME}, whom the {DIVINITY} have chosen to bear their message in this present Age.
You don't have 1000 denars.
I am listening.
So what goes on here?
Very well. We will come with you.
The {CLAN_NAME} and the {KINGDOM_NAME} have signed a mercenary contract.
{PARTY_NAME} has left {ARMY_NAME}.
You've done well by me in the past, {PLAYER.NAME}, and for that I will go along with your request, but know that I do not like you using our relationship this way.[ib:closed][if:convo_stern]
The settlement is under siege.
Now is not a good time, {PLAYER.NAME}.
So, what would you like to do?
Sign me up for the tournament.
I'd like to participate in a practice fight...
Are there any tournaments going on in nearby towns?
I need to leave now. Good bye.
There won't be any tournaments any time soon.
Go to it! Grab a practice weapon on your way down.[if:convo_approving]
Very well - we'll enter your name in the lots, and when your turn comes up, be ready to go out there and start swinging![if:convo_merry]
I'll do that.
On second thought, I'll hold off.
I'll be ready.
Actually, never mind.
Where exactly did you have in mind?[rf:happy]
Thank you. I knew you are a reasonable {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?}.
Very well. Thanks for your time.
Your settlement {SETTLEMENT} is under attack by {PARTY} of {FACTION}!
Daughter returns to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} is happy. Sends {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} regards with a large pouch of {BASE_REWARD}{GOLD_ICON}.
A relative of {QUEST_GIVER.NAME} kills a relative of {TARGET_NOTABLE.NAME}. {QUEST_GIVER.NAME} offers to pay blood money for the crime but {TARGET_NOTABLE.NAME} wants revenge.
Okay then lets go with better troops, I am ready to pay {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} to create a caravan.
{?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}Madame{?}Sir{\?}, I must have more time to consider this.
Who is imprisoned here?
Funny how the boundary stones on {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME}'s land always seem a little bit closer every time you look at them.
I am a sister in our order.
Well, you can assign a companion of yours with a knack for this kind of game and enough muscles to back him up. Judging from what I have heard, a group of {NEEDED_MEN_COUNT} should be enough.
Are you sure?
The spy is known to carry a sword.
I will be back.

You have defeated the thugs that held {PRODIGAL_SON.LINK} as {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has asked you to. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Lady{?}Lord{\?} {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} soon sends {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} best regards and a sum of {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} as a reward.
You decided to stay out of the fight. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} will certainly lose to the rival gang without your help.
Talk to her
Well, I am disappointed, but I am sure that you will have many chances to redeem yourself.[ib:closed][if:convo_bored]
I have hardly heard of you, {PLAYER.NAME}. Go fight a few bandits, make a name for yourself. Then we can talk.
I am waiting for the right moment.
You shared your food with starving soldiers of your army. You gained {INFLUENCE}{INFLUENCE_ICON}.
I have a quick question.
Quartermaster {CURRENTLY_HELD_QUARTERMASTER}
I own {STRING_UNTIL_NOW} there.
I need more time.
I want to visit the lord's hall.
You don't have enough money to buy this workshop.
Actually, I was going to talk about something else.
All right then. I'll have a look at the prison.
We came here looking for work, as there was none in the village. But the masters want skilled hands only. With a few coins, I could go home.
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.LINK}. {FACTION_DESCRIPTION}
{SETTLEMENT} is under siege. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is canceled.
{LORD_INTRODUCTION_STRING} {TOWN_INFO_STRING}
Your clan is at war with factions with which the {KINGDOM} is at peace.
You are right, {?PLAYER.GENDER}my lady{?}sir{\?}. I should be moving immediately.
I would like to change what you are producing here.
I wish to reward you for your services.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} shared their plan for robbing {TARGET_MERCHANT.LINK} with you. You agreed to talk with {TARGET_MERCHANT.LINK} to convince {?TARGET_MERCHANT.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} to guard {?TARGET_MERCHANT.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} caravan and lead the caravan to ambush around {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}.
I am not allowed to talk with you.
Let's begin, then.
Search the village
You don't have the money to hire us.
You have successfully robbed {TARGET_MERCHANT.LINK}'s caravan with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
Did I ask you to speak? Your kin best scrape together a ransom before my patience runs out.
Of course, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.
Certainly! Looks like a few of our lads are warming up now for the tournament. You can go and hop in if you want to. Or come back later if you just want to practice.[ib:warrior]

You ask around the village if anyone saw {TARGET_HERO.NAME} or some suspicious characters with a young woman.

Villagers say that there was a young man and woman who arrived here exhausted. The villagers allowed them to stay for a while.
You can check the area, and see if they are still hiding here.
We are only mercenaries serving under {EMPLOYER_FACTION_INFORMAL_NAME}. We cannot negotiate peace on behalf of our employers.
That looks good, let's play!
How much will you pay me for my service?
A pleasure to have met you.

Ah, yes, these are the most interesting kinds of games, aren't they? I won't deny myself the pleasure but clearly that deed is worth more to him than just the value of the land. I'll wager the deed, but you need to put up 1000 denars.

Well.. Sometimes when you learn a skill, you pick up a certain way of doing it that can help you in some circumstances and hurt you in others. If you wanted to retrain yourself, your companions, or members of your clan to do things a different way, you might try the tournament master at the arena. They'll help you - for a price, of course.
Caravan of {TARGET_MERCHANT}
Speak respectfully about your elders, you filthy ragamuffin!
No! I won't go anywhere near them! They'll kill me![ib:closed]
No, we are doing fine.
My companion can handle it. Do not worry.

Yes, we're hiring mercenaries. We pay you to fight, though, not just ride around the countryside. You'll get {MERCENARY_AWARD}{GOLD_ICON} whenever you take down an enemy party, or do a similar service.
{KEY} Sit

Well, let's just say there's an idea I've been mulling over. You may be able to help. Have you met {TARGET_MERCHANT.NAME}? {?TARGET_MERCHANT.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} is a very rich merchant. Very rich indeed. But not very honest… It's not right that someone without morals should have so much wealth, is it? I have a plan to redistribute it a bit.
Follow me.
Very well. Have them join me now.
You're breaking the law.
Well, it will cost you {COST}{GOLD_ICON} to buy it out. Are you going to buy it?
Your actions have started a war with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s faction. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} cancels your agreement and the quest is a failure.
Right now I'm looking for work, if you have anything to offer.

Good, even better. You can find the house easily when you go to {SETTLEMENT} and walk around the town square. Or you could just speak to this gang leader, {TARGET_HERO.LINK}, and make {?TARGET_HERO.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} understand and get my boy released. Good luck. I await good news.
Well, if he wanders off to another town, or gets his throat slit, or loses the deed, that would be the wrong moment, now wouldn't it?
Please do so. Hate to have word leak out.
That's too much. I will be back later.
{PERSUASION_OPTION_LINE} {SUCCESS_CHANCE}
Until next time, then.
I am sure you can solve it.
I'm afraid I don't have time for another game.
You can count on me, {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}.
I accept. Let us stop making war upon each other, for the time being anyway
I swear to fight your enemies and give shelter and water to your friends...

Well, even the practice fights draw those who like to bet on the outcome. But the tournaments! Those pull in crowds from miles around. The merchants love a tournament, and that's why they pony up the silver we need to pay the good souls like you who take and receive the hard knocks.
Just get out of my sight.
Excellent! Have a good day, then, {?PLAYER.GENDER}my lady{?}my lord{\?}.
Why doesn't {OWNER.LINK} do anything about the thieves plying their trade out on the street? Could it be that {?OWNER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} is getting a cut of their take?
What? Why? Did I do something wrong?[ib:closed]
You defeated the Game Host and got the deed back. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.{newline}"Thank you for resolving this issue so neatly. Please accept these {GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars with our gratitude."
I thank you.[if:convo_focused_happy]
Yes... I am weary of fighting you. I could offer you a truce of forty days. If you keep your word and do not molest my lands and subjects, we may talk again...
Farewell, my husband. Safe travels, and a swift return.
a servant of the Heavens
Well I'm anxious, but I am in your hands now. I trust you will protect me {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}sir{\?}.
What are you playing at, {PLAYER.NAME}? Go and make up your mind, and stop wasting my time.
No, sorry. Haven't seen anything like that.
Stop. We don’t need to fight any longer. You have made your point. We will accept the blood money.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} wants you to find a spy before he causes any harm...
I hear {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is going to sort it out with {RIVAL_GANG_LEADER.LINK} once and for all.
Splendid. Go have a word with {TARGET_MERCHANT.LINK}. If you can convince {?TARGET_MERCHANT.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} to guide the caravan, we will wait in ambush along their route.
I have decided to free you. You may go.
Things are good, and {NOTABLE.LINK} says we should credit this to the wisdom of {?OWNER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} {OWNER.LINK}.
Good, good.

You can keep my relative under your protection for a time until the calls for vengeance die down. Maybe you can leave one of your warrior companions and {ALTERNATIVE_TROOP_COUNT} men with him to protect him.
I have changed my mind.
I do not believe we have any quarrel with you.
Thank you {PLAYER.NAME}, I hope your people will be successful.
Old skinflint {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME} is my great-uncle's son, and not a blessed penny will {?NOTABLE.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} give me in hard times.
Your clan is now at war with {QUEST_GIVER_SETTLEMENT_FACTION}. Quest is canceled.
Change the leader of the alley
Then I'll make it worth your while. (-{BRIBE_MONEY}{GOLD_ICON})
We leave the arena open to anyone who wants to practice. There are no rules, no teams. Everyone beats at each other until there is only one fighter left standing. Sounds like fun, eh?[ib:confident2]

Is that so? Hey, caravan captain, whatever your name is… As long as we're all switching sides here, how about I join with you to defeat this miscreant who just betrayed both of us? Whichever of us comes out of this with the most men standing keeps your goods.
{?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} cares nothing about me! Only about {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} reputation in our district.
Whom are you looking for?
suppose someone wanted to buy some goods and didn't want to pay the customs tax. We might be able to help that person out.
Your people have been true to their word, and paid us on time, so we will be true to ours.
your highness
It's almost harvesting season.
Then you are sure? Also, be aware that if you leave my services, you will be surrendering to me all the fiefs which you hold in my name.
I have a proposal that may benefit us both.
I believe you have already pledged yourself to another liege.

Yes, I don't care how you solve it. Just solve it any way you like. I reckon {NEEDED_MEN_COUNT} led by someone who knows how to handle thugs could solve this in about {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_DURATION} days. I'd send my own men but it could cause complications for us to go marching in wearing our clan colors in another lord's territory.
Right. I won't be going anywhere.
Greetings my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. It's good to see you here. How can I help you?
Aye? What is it?
many more

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, a {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} from the {QUEST_GIVER_CLAN} clan, asked you to go to {SETTLEMENT} to free {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} relative. The young man is currently held by {TARGET_HERO.LINK}, a local gang leader, because of his debts. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has suggested that you make an example of the gang so no one would dare to hold a nobleman again. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} said you can easily find the house in which the young nobleman is held in the town square.

Well.. There are many goods around the town that can bring good money if you trade them. A caravan you formed will do this for you. You need to pay at least {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} to hire {NUMBER_OF_MEN} caravan guards to form a caravan and you need one companion to lead the caravan guards.
Your Clan Tier needs to be {TIER} to become a vassal.
Thank you {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sir{\?}. For your kindness and understanding. We won't forget this.
Never mind.
About your position in the clan...

You have failed to defeat the thugs that keep {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s relative captive. After your assault you learn that they move the boy to a more secure place. Now its impossible to find him. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} will have to deal with {TARGET_HERO.LINK} himself now. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} won't be happy to hear this.
On second thought, such an accord would not be in my interests.
I can increase quality of troops, but cost will proportionally increase, too. It will cost {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, a gang leader from {SETTLEMENT} has told you about a rival that is trying to get a foothold in {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} town. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} asked you to wait {DAY_COUNT} days so that the other gang lets its guard down.
That's the right call, boss. You should never let go of a good investment.
Ah. A good match, that.
I hope so.
One of {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME}'s hunting hounds took down my cousin's sheep, but {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME} paid twice the beast's value in compensation -- very fair, I say, very fair indeed.
We will fight for you if you can afford our fee. Please have a look at our terms and see if they are acceptable.
I no longer need you as Surgeon.
Hello, {PLAYER.NAME}. Good to see you again.
The {?NOTABLE.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} {NOTABLE.LINK}...
Let it be known that you are one of the Battanians. You may till our soil and sit in our councils. Who quarrels with you, quarrels with all of us.
We'll make ready to set out at once.
Your men on the slopes below saw you collapse, and rushed up to your aid. They tended to your wounds as well as they could, and you will survive. They are now awaiting your next decision.
About the task you gave me...
I will be honored. See you outside.[DEBUG]
After that winter, the cow's too thin to pull the plough. Don't know where I'll get the money to rent one.[rf:convo_grave]

Yes -- there is something you can do for us. We have heard reports that a group of {s4} have established a hideout in this area, and have been attacking travellers. If you could find their lair and destroy it, we would be very grateful.
Yeah. About that {NOTABLE.LINK}. A hard {?NOTABLE.GENDER}one{?}master{\?} to work for, they say. One mistake and you're out on the street.

You have failed to extract {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s relative captive in time. They have moved the boy to a more secure place. Its impossible to find him now. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} will have to deal with {TARGET_HERO.LINK} himself now. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} won't be happy to hear this.
Let's finish this!
You couldn't find the spy and dueled the wrong warrior. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is disappointed.
I'm {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. There's some who know me as {CONVERSATION_HERO.LINK}. That's a term of respect, by the way.[if:convo_mocking_revenge]
Are you the {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?} who thinks our blood is cheap, that we will accept silver for the life of one of our own?
Thank you my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. I will always remember this grand gesture.[rb:positive][rf:happy]
Is there anything else?
Manage Alley
You are wounded and in disguise.
Rejoin the others and let's be off.
Unfortunately, I can't take you back right now.
The caravan leader said your decisions were wasting their time and decided to go on his way. You have failed to uphold your part in the plan.
Anything else?
We do not need hired swords currently because we are not at war. You should seek your fortune elsewhere.
You have done a wise thing, {PLAYER.NAME}. Serve me well and I promise, you will rise high.
As the magistrate of this district, I hereby order that blood money shall be accepted. This is a crime of passion, not malice. Tell {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} to take the silver or face my wrath!
You were unable to defeat {RIVAL_GANG_LEADER.LINK}'s gang, and thus failed to fulfill your commitment to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.
I have no wish to fight, but I shall certainly not surrender.[ib:closed]
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has finally sent a messenger telling you it's time to meet {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} and join the fight.
Just a minute..
Yeah. I've seen one like that around the arena, asking all matter of outlandish questions. Middle-aged, normal head of hair, that's really all I can remember though.
I do not see it as being in my current interest to make peace.
You are in your alley by the {ALLEY_TYPE}, {FURTHER_INFO}
My father? Oh, thank god! I saw terrible things. They took my beloved one and slew many innocents without hesitation.
Let my contract be ended.
I found a purse with {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} a few paces away. I reckon it belongs to you.
Well, I thought you were here to be sheared, but it looks like the sheep bites back. Very well, nicely played, here's your man's land back.
Thank you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}sir{\?}.
Hello there, are you looking for a friendly match? A wager perhaps?
Very well.
I fear I cannot accept such a mission at the moment.
I no longer need you as Engineer.
They say {NOTABLE.LINK} is hiring at {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} {.%}{SHOP_TYPE}{.%}. {?NOTABLE.GENDER}She{?}He{\?}'s a slippery one.

As well you might! They're a grand old imperial custom that's now spread all over Calradia. Back in the old days, they'd give a hundred condemned criminals swords and have them slash at each other until the sands were drenched in blood![if:convo_merry]
Let me think again.
Good to meet you.
So be it.
You are right, {LORD_SALUTATION}. My place is here.
One of your alleys has lost its leader or is lacking troops
You haven't got enough denars to change production.
{HERO.LINK} should be just around the corner...[ib:normal]
Sure. You know where to find me.
You may be entitled to that land in recompense for your service to us. [Will cost {VALUE} influence]
You have found {QUEST_GIVER.NAME}'s daughter.
my friend
At the last moment, you decided to side with the caravan guard and defend them.

Nowadays things are a little different, of course. The emperors got worried about the people's morals and steered them toward more virtuous kinds of killing, like wars. But the games still go on, just with blunted weapons.
I do not have the authority to make peace on behalf of the {ENEMY_INFORMAL_NAME}. Our council should decide whether to offer peace, and what the terms will be.
{PLAYER.NAME}! Is this true? Look, you're a smart {?PLAYER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?}. You know that {TARGET_MERCHANT.LINK} can pay more than these scum. Take the money and keep your reputation.
I want to speak with a prisoner.
If a worthy task presents itself, however, I may have a favor to ask of you at a later date.
Right... {GOLD_AMOUNT} Here you are.
Hard times... Hard times indeed.
Tell me how it's in my interest...
I must say, my lady, I am indeed delighted to have met you. I hope to see you again soon.
Right...Well, I gave you a chance.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
May I be of service, {?PLAYER.GENDER}your ladyship{?}your lordship{\?}?
Abandon the alley
Hard times... Can't find good help these days. Half of 'em are too hungry to work. The other half are thieves. Smart ones all left weeks ago.[rf:confused_annoyed]
A mouthy one, eh? At him, lads![ib:aggressive][if:idle_angry][ib:normal]
Very well. As you're paid for each battle, not for a fixed period of time, you can end it whenever you like.
I'll be sheep.
You won a deed of land from my associate. I'm here to win it back.

I'm {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. I've lived all my life here, working the land, as do my kin. A lot of the people here in {VILLAGE_NAME}, the common farmers and craftsmen like me, they like me to speak for them.
We had a good run, boss. Maybe we can work again some time. It will take sometime to pack things up and everything.
two healthy babies
I have someone else in mind.
Barter line - you should not see this.
None of your business.
On second thought, forget it.
And as such, that you are my commander, and I shall follow you wherever you lead.
I will talk with them right away
Do you have any orders for your alley, {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}
I no longer need you as Scout.
Thank you, but there's no need. Once we are out of here I can manage to return on my own. I appreciate your efforts. I'll tell everyone in my clan of your heroism.
Yeah, sure. Later, then.
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}, {FACTION_DESCRIPTION}. I have come here because many have gone astray, and listen to false preachers who distort the true meaning of the divine revelations.
Reward Items
Let me see what you have for sale...
Any traveler can be asked by an enemy to spy on the places he travels. How can I track this one down?
{MENTOR.NAME}'s House
And by the way, we take orders from {ALLEY_BOSS.NAME}, and no one else.
Mmm, a generous gift to my coffers would certainly help matters... {BRIBE_MONEY}{GOLD_ICON} should do it. If you agree, then I'll go with your suggestion.
Where is the caravan? My men can't wait here for too long.
I am deeply obligated to you. I shall endeavor to do what I can, within the bounds of honor, to return the favor.[if:convo_focused_happy]
Sure thing, boss.[ib:demure]
Actually, I think you're the one who ought to surrender.
Thank you.
The {SIEGE_ENGINE} of {BESIEGER_PARTY} has been destroyed.
We're on our way to {HERO.LINK}...[ib:demure]

Hmm... Only loyal vassals of {FACTION_LEADER} can own lands and castles. While kings will sometimes accept vassalage from men who prove themselves in battle, and grant them land, I have never heard of a king who gave fiefs to women. You had best discuss that issue with {FACTION_LEADER} himself.
Eh? What do you want?
{CLAN_MEMBER.NAME} is in charge of the alley.

Ah! I was looking for this all day. How good of you to bring it back {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. Well, now that I know what an honest {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}man{\?} you are, there can be no harm in letting you inside for a look. Go in.... Just so you know, though -- I'll be hanging onto the keys, in case you were thinking about undoing anyone's chains.
All of you can stop following me and return to what you were doing.
I will assign a companion with {NEEDED_MEN_COUNT} good men for {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_DURATION} days.
{KEY} Use
Afraid I can't recall anyone like that, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.

You have accepted to talk to {CULPRIT.LINK} in {QUEST_GIVER_SETTLEMENT} first and convince him to go to {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} with you in {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} and mediate the issue between them peacefully and end unnecessary bloodshed. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} said {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} will pay you {REWARD_GOLD} once the boy is safe again.
Yes, you are right. I shall be on my way...
You can't practice in the arena because there is a tournament going on right now.
Good, let's finish this.
I will do that.
Ah. In that case, there is little I can do, unless you have some further argument to make.
Yes, I'll play again.

I accept you as my sworn follower. You shall have the warrior's due: the warmth of my hearthfire and the bread of my fields, and gold for your valor. I shall uphold your rights under the Law of the Sturgians and avenge your blood if you fall.
I want you to join my party.
Clans that own a settlement are not considered as mercenaries.
Actually, I've changed my mind. I'll talk to {?HERO.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} later...
Round is over, your team is qualified for the next stage of the tournament.
How gallant. I hope some day I may be in a position to return the favor.
I am pleased to hear it, {PLAYER.NAME}. I hope you'll banish such unworthy thoughts from your mind from now on.
I'm not surrendering, so do what you must.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
the {WEAPON} of {BESIEGER} hit ranged engines of {SETTLEMENT}!
Time to butcher and salt our meat for the winter.
Fine, you know {ALLEY_BOSS.NAME}, you can be here. Just no trouble, you understand?
Your Clan Tier needs to be {TIER}.{newline}You also need a relation of {RELATION} with {HERO.NAME}.
Your duel has not ended yet!
Yes, of course. Just ask me if there is anything you need.
Yes, yes. Goodbye.
No, not now.
I might be willing to pay for passage.
Those troublemakers - they're not from around here. I can't believe it's anyone from around here. You hear people talking foreign more and more these days - I'm sure it's them.

My sister's husband is in the tavern with all the layabouts, throwing away his wages on drinking and dice while his family weeps. I hope {NOTABLE.LINK} gathers some righteous folk and sets fire to it! I'd carry a torch myself, I would.
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. I have been chosen by the people of {REBEL_SETTLEMENT_NAME} to lead them in their struggle against tyranny.
I promised to protect the boy at the cost of my life. If you try to harm him, you will bleed for it.
{SALUTATION}... Thank you for freeing me.
In order to find {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s daughter, you have decided to visit nearby villages.
Great. As I said we need minimum of {NUMBER} days, so they'll let their guard down. I will let you know when it's time. Remember, we wait for the dark of the night to strike.
Lucon Lucon I've been told, sir. Was born old and just got older.{newline}Lives in a palace made of gold. Where it's always dark and it's always cold.
Take whatever time you need, my lady.
You are my prisoner now.
Yeah... Now I remember you.
The {CLAN_NAME} clan has left the {KINGDOM_NAME}.
Thank you.
You bet! Say, you look like a fighter. You should join. Back in the old days it was all condemned criminals and fights to the death, but nowadays they use blunted weapons.
Good day, friend. I'll bet you came here for the games, or as they say nowadays, the tournament!
I'm not sure why
I shall claim it.
Farewell, then.
your ladyship
I have great hopes for you {PLAYER.NAME}. I know you shall prove yourself worthy of the trust I have placed in you.
Now, some will tell you that {NOTABLE.LINK} is no better than a common thief who deserves the gallows, but my cousin says {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME} did him a good turn. So I don't know what to believe...
You will play on as {HEIR.NAME}.
Now, feel free to place a bet.
You are right. Maybe we need to persuade {QUEST_GIVER.NAME}
Why yes... At the tavern last night... Cornered a drunk and kept pressing him for information about the gatehouse. Had a beard, that one did.
I don't want to fight, but I will if you make me.[ib:closed][if:idle_angry]
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s village {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} was raided. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is canceled.
Gang Party
I no longer need you as Quartermaster.
You would need to talk to our leader {KING.LINK} on this matter. {?KING.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} is {?IS_PRISONED}unfortunately held captive{?}currently{\?} {?IS_IN_SETTLEMENT}at{?}near{\?} {SETTLEMENT}.
Lamed by an arrow in the leg, and now I can't work a field and I'm no use to anyone, they say.
Good. You may pass.
I do not wish to play games with the likes of you.
Lead the way.
Sure. Why not?
Bring it on.
Their direction is marked with an arrow in the campaign map.
I gave my word to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, and I won't be bought.
Your clan is now owner of the settlement. As the lord of the settlement you cannot be part of the criminal activities anymore. Your agreement with the questgiver has canceled.
{WEAPON} of {SETTLEMENT} hit ranged engines of {BESIEGER}!
Very well. Now, what side do you want?
Confront {HOSTILE_GANG_LEADER.NAME} about {?HOSTILE_GANG_LEADER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} attack on your alley.
I will go off on my own, then. I can stay busy. But I'll remember - I owe you one!
Very well, take care.
You plundered {PRODUCTS}.
You can't move. Chose one of the opponent's pawns to remove and make a move
Yeah... Later.

I've got a problem... And {?TARGET_NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} name is {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK}. {?TARGET_NOTABLE.GENDER}Her{?}His{\?} people have been coming around outside the walls, robbing the dice-players and the drinkers enjoying themselves under our protection. Me and my boys are eager to teach them a lesson but I figure some extra muscle wouldn't hurt.
Eh, what do you mean by that?[ib:closed][if:convo_annoyed]
I offer you one chance to surrender or die.
Tell me how the practice fights work.
I've heard that story before. What did you lose?
Gang leader needs help to beat the rival gang.
That is lower than what I had in mind. Let me think about it.
I have some questions.
Come see me again soon, {PLAYER.NAME}, you hear?
You will pay {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} denars.
Right... Well, you be off, then. Keep safe.
I'm just having a look. Do you mind?
Good. Pay us our dues, according to the laws of our people, and you shall have safe passage.
I'm sorry but I gave a promise. I don't break my promises.
Greetings, traveler. Do you play {GAME_NAME}? I am reckoned a master of this game, the traditional pastime of the {CULTURE_NAME}. If you are interested in playing, take a seat and we'll start.
I'll be white.
We are waiting for your good news {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}sir{\?}.
Forgive me, {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. I don't know what I was thinking.
Listen to me. Have any of the tournament participants spent long hours in the market and tavern? More than usual?
Farewell. If no one slits your throat out there, perhaps we shall meet again.
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}, a merchant here in {SETTLEMENT_STRING}. {BUSINESS_STRING}
Have you met the man who took my deed? Did you get it back?
Thank you, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. If your men can find my girl and bring her back to me, I will be so grateful. I will pay you {BASE_REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} for your trouble.
Sounds good. I wish to enter your service as a mercenary.
You managed to find the spy but lost the duel. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is disappointed.
As you wish. Let me know if you change your mind.
I stand my ground. Prepare to fight!
That was fun, but I've learned not to inflict too great a humiliation on those who carry a sword. I'll take my winnings and enjoy them now. Good-bye to you!
The {CLAN_NAME} changed from the {OLD_FACTION_NAME} to the {NEW_FACTION_NAME}.
Good to see you. But we still need to wait until after dusk. {HERO.LINK}'s men may be watching, so let's keep our distance from each other until night falls.
Whose workshop is this?
You don't have any suitable clan members to assign this alley. ({ROGUERY_SKILL} skill {NEEDED_SKILL_LEVEL} or higher, {TRAIT_NAME} trait {MAX_TRAIT_AMOUNT} or lower)
As you wish. Your enemies are my enemies.
You heard me. Yield or fight!
Let me think about it.
..and to uphold your rights under the laws of the Sturgians, and the rights of your kin, and to avenge their blood as thought it were my own.
Let's do some diagnostics about your faction.
Try to forget all about these and return to your father's house.
Give me the keys to the cells -- now!
Right now I'm working for {EMPLOYER}.
That was a fun game. Thank you.
maybe you've lost something of value. Come ask us, and perhaps we can find it for you. For a fee, naturally.
And what about my duties as a mercenary?
You have succeeded in defending your alley against the attack. You might want to leave some troops in order to compensate for your losses in the fight.

You were defeated by the rogue. He and {TARGET_HERO.NAME} ran off while you were unconscious. You failed to bring the daughter back to her {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}mother{?}father{\?} as promised to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} is furious.
Sure, I'll play at the hardest level.
Please, {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sir{\?}. I love him truly and I wish to spend the rest of my life with him. I beg of you, please don't stand in our way.
Good, good. That's the best way to do these things. Go to {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}, find this game host and wipe the smirk off of his face.
I see. We will speak again when you are relieved from your duty.
Of course not, {LORD_SALUTATION}. I am ever your loyal vassal.
I'll be black.
I want to abandon this area.
Sorry. No progress yet.
Yes, did you bring {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}? That's what he owes... With an interest of course.
Yes, {LORD_SALUTATION}.
Is that so? Well, I suppose you're just not up to the task. I shall have to look for somebody with more mettle.
Here is the money, now release him!
Good to hear that.
Yes... Why not? I have nothing too urgent right now.
I'm willing to sell. But it will cost you {COST} {GOLD_ICON}. Are you willing to pay?
Snare The Wealthy
Stay safe, my dear.

Coming to fight me, eh? Did {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} put you up to this? Look, there's no need for bloodshed. This town is big enough for all of us. But... if bloodshed is what you want, I will be happy to provide.
SELECT AN HEIR
Keep safe, {PLAYER.NAME}. I hope to see you again soon.
I'm {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. Ask around about me. You'll be told I keep the peace in the back alleys.[ib:warrior]
No offense, captain, but if that's the case you need to get out more. Anyway, shall we go to it?
I would be honored, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. But I can't take on any new responsibilities while leading this caravan. If you wish to relieve me of my duties, we can discuss this further.
Door is locked!
You know, I think I'd prefer to take all the loot for myself.
When there's no tournament, it's still worth coming by. A lot of fighters spend their time here practicing to keep in trim, and we'll award the winners a few coins for their troubles.
I'll deposit the money. You arrange some tools and workers and let's get it built.

I proclaim you a citizen of the Empire, of the rank of Senator. Your life and property shall be protected by our laws, and shall not be taken from you except by law. You may serve as a magistrate over towns and villages and as a general over armies, if we call upon you to do so.
Hello there friend. Are you here for the tournament.
Ay, these are hard days indeed...
Calm down! Your father has sent me to find you.
I want to go back to something you'd mentioned earlier...
Look, friend, we'll both eat better tonight if you move to a different spot. Too many of us, and the masters and ladies give a wide berth.

I prefer if you do this yourself, but one of your trusted companions with a strong sword-arm and enough brains to set an ambush can do the job with {TROOP_COUNT} fighters. We'll split the loot, and I'll throw in a little bonus on top of that for you..

Let it be known that you are adopted into the Khuzait confederacy, and that you shall be considered of the ancestry of the 12 sons of the she-wolf. You may sit in our councils of war and of peace. We shall ride to defend your flocks and avenge your blood if you fall. Your herds may graze in our lands and drink from our springs.

{COMPANION.LINK} and the men you sent with {?COMPANION.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} safely return with the news of success. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is happy and sends you {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} regards with {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} the money he promised.
Lead on, then.

Everything is wrong. He is from a low family, the kind who is always involved in some land fraud scheme, or seen dealing with known bandits. Every village has a black sheep like that but I never imagined he would get his hooks into my daughter!
I'm afraid my finances will not allow for such a gift.
I hear there have been secret meetings in the woods. Solemn oaths, signed in blood. A great wind is going to blow soon - you mark my words.
You are right. You are free to deliver justice as you see fit.
Very well, my dear. I hope we can soon sort out the terms of our marriage.
Hmm. That's possible. Which one?
I am still working on it.
You can start.
There's a tournament going on?
Um... What are you saying?
Good to have you here, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. We shall raze them down now.
We'll fight to our last drop of blood!
Olek Olek fought a bear. Took it down, fair and square.{newline}Not with his sword and not with his spear. But with his breath of garlic and beer.
You are in disguise.
Apologies, my sword is not for hire.

He is right! I ran away with him willingly. I love my {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}mother{?}father{\?}, but {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} can be such a tyrant. Please {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sir{\?}, if you believe in freedom and love, please leave us be.
The lots also determine what weapons you get. The winners of each match proceed to the next round. When only two are left, they battle each other to be declared champion.
Having the {TARGET_MERCHANT.LINK} by your side, you were successful in protecting the caravan.
Best not sing that to every stranger you meet, child.
My {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, may I have a word please?
You're a good friend to have. A very good friend.[if:convo_focused_happy]
I am {PLAYER.NAME}. And who are you?
Leave it empty
Can't let down your guard around here. Too many bastards up to no good.
More men have hair than not, but this is another tile in the mosaic.

We would be eternally grateful if you can help my relative. I have to add, I'm ready to pay you {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars for your trouble. He is hiding somewhere here, go talk to him and tell him he is safe now.
Round is over, you survived the final round of the tournament.
Actually, never mind.
Heaven protect me![ib:aggressive][if:convo_astonished]

As the dispenser of justice in the district, you decided to allow {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} to take vengeance for {?TARGET_NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} kinsman. You failed to protect the culprit as you promised. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is furious.
I've heard that {ENEMY_NAME} have been raiding across the border... People around here better wake up.
You did me a good turn. I hope I can repay you.[if:convo_focused_happy]
I'll go right away
This is fair. Join us
Our kingdom is not at war, {PLAYER.NAME}. We have no use for mercenaries.
I knew we'd find you eventually. Now you will face justice!
Bah... Parley's over.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
{ALLEY_ACTIVITY_STRING} {ALLEY_ACTIVITY_ADDITION}
I am afraid I won't be able to do this quest.
Are you ready for the fight?
Okay, is there anything more I can help with?
You're a warrior, are you not? The games are a fine way to make your name. The local merchants put together a nice fat purse for the winner to attract the talent.

I do not have the authority to make peace on behalf of the {ENEMY_INFORMAL_NAME}. {ENEMY_RULER.NAME} and {?ENEMY_RULER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} council should decide whether to offer peace, and what the terms will be.
Very well, please accept these {BRIBE_MONEY}{GOLD_ICON} as a token of my gratitude.
Oh, sorry, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. May I be of service?
The plague took my parents and my uncle took their land. But I'd rather beg than be a servant in a rich man's home!
You are an accomplished player. I will take note of that.
I have heard you are looking for extra swords to protect your caravan. I am here to offer my services.
So, uh, there's a young woman around here. I really need to leave her some money before I go anywhere. Let's say {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} - can you pay me that?
Do you indeed, {PLAYER.NAME}? Then go and trip on your sword. Give us all peace.
Come on now. I thought you were the boss here.
I am here for the boy. {PRODIGAL_SON.LINK}. You know who I mean.
With pleasure.
What? Are you just going to leave me here to be killed? My kin will never forget this!
Can I hold on to any castles I take?
Did {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Lady{?}Lord{\?} {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} send you to rescue me?
Blood money is appropriate for a crime of passion. But you kill this boy in cold blood, you will be a real murderer in the eyes of the law, and will no doubt die.
I want you to go forage some food.
What now?
You didn't bring {DAUGHTER.NAME} to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} must be furious.
Although the gang leader and the caravaneer joined their forces, you have successfully defeated them and kept the loot for yourself.
You command the sons of Asera in war and govern them in peace...
What exactly do you want me to do?
I'll just have one more to keep me warm on the way home.
Anything else I can explain?
Just glad to have full bellies this year in my household. Can't say that for every year.
So what's the plan?
I just have a minute, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. I need to check on a batch that's brewing. How can I help you?
I heard you may need some help with a problem?
The Heavens repay kindness with kindness, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.

You fell unconscious while defending {CULPRIT.LINK}. {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} has taken revenge. You failed to protect {CULPRIT.LINK} as you promised {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} is furious.
I changed my mind. You can go free.
Thank you, {PLAYER.NAME}. I'm sure your companion will be persuasive.

You have successfully protected {CULPRIT.LINK} from harm as you have promised. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is grateful for your service and sends his regards with a purse full of {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars for your trouble.
It was a pleasure to meet you. Safe travels.
We are waiting for {TRAVELING_ALLEY_LEADER.NAME} to come. Until {?TRAVELING_ALLEY_LEADER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} arrives, we'll be extra watchful.
I shall do that.
Yeah... Go on, then.
Hope you don't mind all the sawdust around here, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. How can I help you?
I'll go to the tavern and win it back the same way you lost it.
(Currently unassigned)
I know times are hard, but {NOTABLE.LINK} says {?OWNER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} {OWNER.LINK} is doing what {?OWNER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} can, and I trust {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME}.
Ah, my apologies, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. May I help you with something?
Some day you'll see I did you a favor. Pack up, you need to go.
Indeed. You have shed your blood for me, and you deserve a fief of your own..
Now, it grieves us to do this, but we have mouths to feed and we're going to have ask you to pay for passage through our lands. If you refuse, we'll have no choice but to take your money by force.
Don't worry I'll free him.
{ISSUE_GIVER.NAME} wants {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} daughter found
Hot around here, eh {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}? I need to get back to the forges in a minute, but how can I help you?
Help! Help! Prison break!

Certainly! The arena is open to anyone who doesn't mind hard knocks. Looks like a few of our lads are warming up now. You can go and hop in if you want to. Or come back later when there's a tournament.[ib:warrior]

I'll tell anyone who asks: {NOTABLE.LINK} is a righteous {?NOTABLE.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?}, and speaks for the poor folk. The lords of this land must listen to {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}him{\?}, or misfortune will fall upon us.
Indeed.... Did you offer vassalage, then, just to buy time? Very well -- you shall have time to reconsider, but if you are toying with me, it will do your reputation no credit.
Yes, brother.[ib:demure]
Your clan does not have enough influence to get them to do this!
Your Clan Tier needs to be {TIER}

Your clan is now owner of the settlement. As the {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} of the settlement you cannot get involved in gang wars anymore. Your agreement with the {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has canceled.
You're not going anywhere, friend. You're my prisoner now.
You owe me one.
I am a brother in our order.
I have more important business to do.
Aye, I'll join the {FACTION_NAME}.

I can offer you a contract for three months. At the end of those three, it can be extended month by month. An initial sum of {OFFER_VALUE}{GOLD_ICON} will be paid to you to seal the contract. After that, you'll receive wages from {FACTION_LEADER} each week, according to the number and quality of the soldiers in your company. You still have your rights to battlefield loot and salvage, as well as any prisoners you capture. War can be very profitable at times...
{NOTABLE.LINK} says that a fish rots from the head. Well, look around this place. I think we know what he's getting at.

Oh… I'm afraid there's been a misunderstanding. {PLAYER.NAME} is with us, you see. Did {TARGET_MERCHANT.LINK} stuff you with lies and then send you out to your doom? Oh, shameful, shameful. {?TARGET_MERCHANT.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} does that fairly often, unfortunately.
a healthy baby
Round is over, you are disqualified from the tournament.

It's a deed to a plot of farmland. Not a big or valuable plot, mind you, but I'd rather not have to explain to my men why they won't be sowing it this year. You can find the man who took it from me at the tavern in {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}. They call him the "Game Host". Just be straight about what you're doing. He's in no position to work the land. I don't imagine that he'll turn down a chance to make more money off of it. Bring it back and {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} is yours.
I'll fight the other gang with you myself.
Very well. Let me think on this a bit longer
Our realms should make peace.
Don't worry, either I or one of my companions should be able to find her and see what's going on.
I won't take you prisoner today.
As you wish.

Perfect. Of course you shall have to make a formal declaration of allegiance, and give your oath that you and your company will remain in service to {FACTION_NAME} for a period of no less than three months.
Very well. You have given me your solemn oath, {PLAYER.NAME}. May you uphold it always, with proper courage and devotion.
Let me know how much of a challenge you can stand and we'll get started. I'm ready to offer you a {DIFFICULTY} challenge and {?IS_BETTING}a bet of {BET_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}.{?}friendly game.{\?}
Do you want to load the saved game with different modules?
We will not sign a peace until we are recognized by all the kingdoms of Calradia.
Well, well. What do we have here? Must be one of our lucky days, huh? Release all the valuables you carry and nobody gets hurt.
{?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}My lady{?}Sir{\?}, may I ask for some time to think about this?
The pittance they call a wage these days... I don't want to leave my kin, but I'm thinking I might have to try my luck in some other town.

This is how it goes, friend. This is our turf. We answer to {ALLEY_BOSS.NAME}, and {?ALLEY_BOSS.GENDER}she's{?}he's{\?} like the {?ALLEY_BOSS.GENDER}queen{?}king{\?} here. So if you haven't got a good reason to be here, clear out.
Hmf... Very well. I shall wipe out this insult with your blood.
They say {NOTABLE.LINK} turned one of {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} artisans at the {.%}{SHOP_TYPE}{.%} out on the street for not showing up to work at first light. Hard times, these.
I'm getting this together as quickly as I can.
{PLAYER.NAME} will retire. {HEIR_PART} Would you like to continue?
I hope {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} can work out that trouble with {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} kinsman.
Yes, I'm here to take you back.
Let us speak again soon, {PLAYER.NAME}.
Have you talked with {TARGET_MERCHANT.NAME}? It would be a damned waste if we waited too long and word of our plans leaked out.
My {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, it would be an honor if you were to choose the name of my noble house.
Look, it was a good try, but they're not going to pay. Releasing the kid is the only move that makes sense.
Very well. But the world being as it is, I'm going to need {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} as a down payment on my services. Can you pay that?
I want to join your army.
There is something I'd like to discuss.
I have a proposal that may spare us both unnecessary bloodshed.
Stay your hand! Perhaps we don't have to come to blows.
You can stop following me now. Thanks.

During the games, all the best fighters from the area form teams and pummel each other. Not quite as much fun for the crowd as watching gladiators spill their guts out, of course, but healthier for the participants.[if:convo_approving]
Your clan member {MOTHER.NAME} has given birth to {DELIVERED_CHILDREN}.

Yes, you have heard correctly. I am looking for a capable leader with a good number of followers. You only need to escort the caravan until they reach {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}. A simple job, but the cargo is very important. I'm willing to pay {MERCHANT_REWARD} denars. And of course, if you betrayed me...
Are you mad? I'm not your enemy.
Very well, then. What is it?
Hope you don't mind the smoke around here, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. Got to keep the kilns hot. How can I help you?
I wish to buy one of your workshops.
Perhaps {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} made those plans because {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} loves you.
Yes. Take these troops with you.
I would like to end my contract with the {FACTION_NAME}.
On second thought, let's keep this match friendly.
Furthermore, I accept induction into the army of Calradia, at the rank of archon.
You failed to protect {CULPRIT.LINK} as you promised {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is furious.
This a {.%}{WORKSHOP_TYPE}{.%}, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. {WORKSHOP_DESCRIPTION}
When {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} arrived, you kept your side of the bargain and attacked the caravan
Why not? I'm not going anywhere right now, and I could use another drink.
What's that?
Yes? Do you have something to say?
You can count on me. As of now, your enemies are my enemies and your honor is my honor.
So... Does this please you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}my lady{?}my lord{\?}?
Forgive me. It's nothing.

Thank you my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. I am sure your men will protect the boy and {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} will have nothing to do but to accept the blood money. I have to add, I'm ready to pay you {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars for your trouble.

Your companions report that the {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}'s daughter returns to {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} safe and sound. {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} is happy and sends {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} regards with a large pouch of {BASE_REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON}.
{?PLAYER.GENDER}Madam{?}Sir{\?}, we are still waiting for your men to bring my daughter back. I pray for their success.
Can I change the difficulty?
I want you to recruit some troops.
Never mind.
Very good. I'm sure you'll chose competent men to bring our boy back.
{SALUTATION_BY_PLAYER}, I would pledge allegiance to you and be counted among your loyal followers.
The tax on this, the tax on that... Now just what do we think our beloved {?OWNER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} {OWNER.LINK} does with it all?

My family is concerned for the boy's life. He has gone hiding around the village commons. We need someone who can protect him until {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} sees reason, accepts the blood money and ends the feud. We would be eternally grateful, if you can help my relative and take him with you for a while maybe.
Sure. Follow me.
Every day... More people in the markets... More people at the well... Where do they all come from?

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} told you that he lost a land deed in a wager in {TARGET_CITY}. He needs to buy it back, and he wants your companions to intimidate the seller into offering a reasonable price. You asked {COMPANION.LINK} to take {TROOP_COUNT} of your men to go and take care of it. They should report back to you in {RETURN_DAYS} days.
I don't want any trouble. Later.
If it will not please you, then I'll try something else.
And how would you serve us?
Round is over, your team is disqualified from the tournament.
I hate you! You killed him! I can't believe it! I will hate you with all my heart till my dying days.[if:convo_angry]
I do not care to talk about my past.

A couple of powerful wolves against a flock of helpless sheep. {GAME_NAME} is a game of uneven odds and seemingly all-powerful adversaries. But through strategy and sacrifice, even the sheep can dominate the wolves.
Could you hurry this along? I don't want him to find another buyer. Thank you.
Yes, captain.[ib:demure]
I swear homage to you as lawful {FACTION_TITLE}.
{ROMANTIC_REACTION} {ROMANTIC_DEFICIENCY}
Prodigal son of {CLAN_NAME}
My own people chased me from the village. It weren't true, what they said about me. Coveted my land, I'll warrant.
{SETTLEMENT_NAME}? This is a great honor, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. I will protect it until the last drop of my blood.[rb:very_positive][rf:happy]
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}, {FACTION_DESCRIPTION}. I have come here to warn people that the time when the Heavens tolerate injustice -- those times are coming to an end.
I'll be here, your {?PLAYER.GENDER}ladyship{?}lordship{\?}.
You have nothing on me. If you try to take me anywhere I'll kill you, and it will be in self-defense.[ib:aggressive]
Heaven help us. If I can't pay the rent, I'll end up on the side of the road with the landless, hoping for a day's work.[rf:confused_annoyed]
Well well well, I wasn't expecting to see you there. There must be some little birds informing you about my plans. That won't change anything, though. I'll still crush you.
You have reached the maximum amount of workshops you can have.
I don't need them right now.
You talked to {TARGET_MERCHANT.LINK} as {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} asked. The caravan is waiting for you outside the gates to be escorted to {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}.
I am currently working as {COMPANION_JOB}.
some men might fancy a game of dice. Figure Lady Luck wants to give them a kiss. We're here to keep things honest.
I'm not interested.

I have no doubt that {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} will have to accept the offer after seeing the boy with that many armed men behind him. Thank you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}, for helping to ending this without more blood.
